apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendering of the couple with heart (man, man, dark skin tone, medium skin tone) emoji showcases two figures with distinct, yet harmoniously blended skin tones, embraced by a warm, glowing heart. On Apple devices, the figures are drawn with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading, conveying intimacy and affection. The vibrant heart, filled with rich color and realistic highlights, symbolizes deep love, partnership, and connection between two men.
